channel.title: Blog on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on ZooBerry

item.title: November 2024 - Mod Backup Summary
item.description: November 2024 - ZooBerry Mod Archive Summary November was a busy month for ZooBerry. With news that ZooAdmin might be making its exit, Yellowrose has asked ZooTek to rehome its content. Our website is luckily in a healthy position to help mitigate the space required for these downloads, so I happily agreed to at least help with the ZT2 files while Tek and the Download Database took care of the ZT1 files.

item.title: October 2024 - Mod Backup Summary
item.description: Not a very productive month in terms of archiving but this is mostly because focus was mostly on releasing ZooBery 2.0 and well, I’m getting hit by midterms at uni. Check out the October list below. Here’s to a more productive November! Stats: 27 mods archived in October 2024. Zoo Tycoon 1 Animals Leatherback Turtle by Khaydar Aberdeen Angus by Hawkkeye666 Abdim’s Stork by Hawkkeye666 Abbot’s Duiker by Hawkkeye666 Abanda Cave Crocodile by Hawkkeye666 Abaco Barb by Hawkkeye666 African Fish Eagle by Hawkkeye666 African Civet by Hawkkeye666 Adelie Penguin by Hawkkeye666 Addra Gazelle by Hawkkeye666 Abyssinian Ground Hornbill by Hawkkeye666 Peryton by Zarawatto Eoraptor by Zarawatto Maps Cenote Workbench by Zarawatto Packs Mexico Natural Icons Pack by Zarawatto Dinosaur Digs Marketing Beta Pack by Serpyderpy, horse14t, Blue Fang Seekings of Depth by Zarawatto Mischevious Erradicators of Outside Wildlife by Zarawatto Bug Mayhem by Zarawatto Toadally Batrocious Land Invaders by Zarawatto Unlimited Feather Overload (U.

item.title: Welcome to the new ZooBerry!
item.description: Welcome to the new ZooBerry! Over the past few months, we’ve been working hard to bring you a new and improved ZooBerry experience. We’ve updated the site to freshen up the look and make it easier to navigate. We’ve also added new features and content to help you get the most out of your Zoo Tycoon experience. Here’s a quick rundown of what’s new: New Design We’ve given the site a fresh coat of paint with a new design that’s cleaner and more modern.

item.title: December 2023 - Mod Backup Summary
item.description: Hello everyone and Happy New Year! It’s been a bit busy these past couple months but @AubreyKitsune has been able to hold down the fort with 32 mod backups in December! Check out the itemized list below: Animals Extinct Tarpan by Chenelle Wooly Mammoth by Burnt_Gecko, and Zooasaurus Fictional Blue-backed Gorilla by Alpha Koala Blue Roo by Nintendo_6444, and Penguinman Grimmace by Alpha Koala Snowstalker by Bobosmokey Winter Kirin by Kingcobrasaurus Living Amur Leopard by Dent-de-sabre Blue Poison Dart Frog by Penguinman, and Nettie Caribbean Reef Squid by Dalturge Cassowary by Burnt_Gecko, and Zooasaurus Mainland Serow by Penguinman Red Eyed Tree Frog by Penguinman, and Nettie Ribbon Eel by Silver Designs, Lazardi, and Thom Strawberry Dart Frog by Penguinman, and Nettie Zebroid by Mikaboshi Asian Golden Cat by reptilegpt Box Turtle by Penguinman, and DinoBoy Lesser Flamingo by Penguinman, and DinoBoy Red Deer by Penguinman Slender-horned Gazelle by King_of_Pangaea, and Penguinman Tibetan Blue Bear by Bobosmokey Animals Bundles Gibbon Pack by Penguinman, and Gibbon-Fanatic Expansive Packs Amur Leopard Mini Pack by Slice Eurasian Wolf Mini Pack by Slice The Christmas Pack by Z-Studio, Zelda-Maniack, and Fauna The Christmas Pack 2: 7 Reasons to Celebrate by Z-Studio, Zelda-Maniack, and Fauna Fire Pack by Penguinman Hacks EA Biome Objects Hack by Kingcobrasaurus Objects Paths Tree Elevated Path Pack by Penguinman Scenery Penguin Fountain by Goosifer Zootilities ZT2DC Gazebo by CrazyPeafowl, Hendrix, koala_pear, Mysty, ShenTirag, Penguinman, and Mikaboshi

item.title: November 2023 - Mod Backup Summary
item.description: November 2023 - ZooBerry Mod Archive Summary 80 mods were were archived on ZooBerry on November 2023. Big thank you to @AubreyKitsune and @Serpyderpy for all of the help! Our pending mods to upload are quite a few, and still many, many to go. Below is the end-of-month mod archive summary as an itemized list. Expansive Packs REPTILIA by ZT ABC European Expeditions [Realistic version] by Hendrix AVES by ZT ABC Zoo Tycoon 2: Operation Genesis - Part 1 by BioHazard Charming Cretaceious by philly, Mr.

item.title: October 2023 - Mod Backup Summary
item.description: The following 8 ZooMania variants have been backed up on ZooBerry: Bengal Tiger Variants by Ktrenal Dromedary Camel Variant by Animalover44 Fennec Fox Variants by Ktrenal Gemsbok Variant by Animalover44 Velociraptor Variants by GoblinShark White Wolverine Variant by Catc ZooMania Mascot Variant by Rhino Rangler ZooManiac Variant by Koala Komander New Mods: Balloon Animal Stand by Goosifer [ZT1]

item.title: September 2023 - Mod Backup Summary
item.description: Summary list of mods backed up on ZooBerry in September.

item.title: Update July 24, 2023
item.description: Updated to ZooBerry Beta v0.2.2 Changelog: Can now click on an author’s name and get a full list of their mods in the ZooBerry database. Can now also get a full list of authors whose files are hosted on ZooBerry along with a list of each of their mods: https://zoo.goosifer.io/authors/ Note that this path will eventually change No other way to get there - there will be a button for it soon.

item.title: Update July 22, 2023
item.description: Updated to ZooBerry v0.1.1 Changelog Improved readability on posts (previous color was too close to background color) Track upcoming features on the ZooBerry Trello: https://trello.com/b/X9FjAPnO/zooberry New Additions Zoo Tycoon 2 Animals Himalayan Tahr by Pavocristantus Pygmy Goat by Animalover44 Nutria by badisbadis101 Narrow-Striped Mongoose by Gloria Spanish Broom Hare by Icy Tree and octavio17493 Wallaroo by adam1990 and ailurus Waterbuck by Koala Komander and Silesian Tomcat Fringe-Eared Oryx by Animalover44 Yellow Mongoose by Gloria Animal edits: updated thumbnail for Goral fixed images not loading for Himalayan Tahr Foliage Giant Bamboo by Penguinman Duckweed, Square by Penguinman Duckweed, Round by Penguinman Foliage edits: fixed download button not generating for large kelp forest Objects Large Safari Fountain by Animalover44 Lighthouse by Animalover44 Mahogany Bench by Animalover44 Mystery Meat Dish by Catc Mystery Meat Trough by Catc South American Trashcan by Koala Komander and Animalover44 ZooMania Path by Animalover44 AA Photo Stand by Penguinman and Samemo Grizzly Bear Statue by Catc Insect Dish by Penguinman Jungle Croc Trashcan by Catc Meat in Wooden Trough by Catc Mystery Meat Carcass by Catc Water Springs Fountain by Catc Packs Mini Trashcan Pack by Catc Binoculars Pack by Penguinman Colored Path Pack by T’ni African Civet and Giant Eland by Otter Lord Zoo Tycoon 1 Animals Perentie by Volksdragon (Vondell) Nile Monitor by Volksdragon (Vondell)
